text: Þis is haræ VII hydæ landboc þe Eadward cing gebocode Godwine yrle of mylebroc on ece yrfæ.
Ðis synd þa landgemæro to Melebroce.
Ærest of hreodbricge on tearstan stream.
Andlang streames on hnutscyllinga mearce and swa andlang mearce on þone holan weg.
Of þam holan wege andlang mearce on fearninga broc; and swa andlang mearce on mylesbroces ford and swa east andlang mearce on þunres lea norþeweardne.
Þanan andlang weges on cinges dic; and swa andlang mearce on þone oðerne holan weg.
Of þam wege on þa ea.
And se westerde be suðan hreoðbricge.
Utt þurh þone stream on þæs cinges steð; and swa andlang streames æft on hreodbricge.
And se haga on hamtune þe þar to gebyrad.
